DataElement.preferredDefinition: Indicator for whether or not there were abnormal findings or observations during immobilization process.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Leading question for any abnormal findings or observations during the immobilization process in preparation for delivery of radiation therapy.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: An object contrived for a specific purpose.:Treatment of a disease by means of exposure of the target or the whole body to radiation. Radiation therapy is often used as part of curative therapy and occasionally as a component of palliative treatment for cancer. Other uses include total body irradiation prior to transplantation.

Concepts.definition: An object contrived for a specific purpose.

Treatment of a disease by means of exposure of the target or the whole body to radiation. Radiation therapy is often used as part of curative therapy and occasionally as a component of palliative treatment for cancer. Other uses include total body irradiation prior to transplantation.

Property.preferredDefinition: The application of a restraint to restrict normal movement of an individual's body, limb, or joint.:This SDTM class captures the observations resulting from planned evaluations to address specific tests or questions such as laboratory tests, ECG testing, and questions listed on questionnaires.

Concepts.definition: The application of a restraint to restrict normal movement of an individual's body, limb, or joint.
This SDTM class captures the observations resulting from planned evaluations to address specific tests or questions such as laboratory tests, ECG testing, and questions listed on questionnaires.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation. Indicators determine or aid in determining whether or not certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied. (On-line Medical Dictionary)

Concepts.definition: An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation and determines or aids in determining whether certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied.
